name: Nukaloid
description:
🤖 Welcome to Robot City 🏙

The power plant guard bots have gone rogue and let the reactor become unstable. Your mission: infiltrate the power plant and deposit your isotope to return the reactor to stability.

Watch your actions carefully. If you overexert your internal reactor it will become unstable as well and damage your components.

Controls
  • WASD - Pan camera
  • R - Reset camera
  • Left Click - Select pathing destination
  • Enter - End turn
  • Space - Step (in game) or skip cutscene (on main menu)
  • Escape - Exit game (on desktop)
Technologies used
  • Unity 2021.1
  • Blender
  • Affinity Designer
  • FL Studio
  • Nodewerk
  • Substance Designer
  • Substance Painter
Changelog

1.0.0

  • Initial release

1.0.1

  • Fixed an issue where the AI could get stuck

1.0.2

  • Fixed typos
  • Fixed button navigation
